content:
meeting in ~10 minutes

rough agenda:

  • update on crater progress (done; all regressions fixed and/or not regressions)
  • rustc release notes by Monday from Mark
  • pick topics for blog? (asm, destructuring assignments, cargo future incompat, cargo strip)
    • https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md
for crater - https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/93034#issuecomment-1021588019 is the only real regression noted, though it's not one we'll fix

Does anyone have something to add on the current topic?
React with :working_on_it: if you have something to say.
React with :all_good: if not.
I'll try to finish (and start) release notes later today, but definitely by Monday

I did have a thought that we probably already know topics for blog, since there's a couple prominent things (as noted in my agenda) that seem obvious candidates, so maybe we can get agreement on those to give @tmandry more weeks to do it :)
those topics seem fine to me -- probably less to say about the cargo ones, but still notable
I think nothing else on my agenda then, @triagebot end-meeting ?

Does anyone have something to bring up?
React with :working_on_it: if you have something to say.
React with :all_good: if you're ready to end the meeting.

alright, thanks all! :wave:

just another reminder to take a look at https://github.com/rust-lang/release-team/issues/16 if you have a few spare minutes :)
